item.title: [508] Godwars Killcount help. [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

This is because you misplaced your:

 //--Start of godwars npc--//

                        if (npcType == 6260) //general graardor
                        {
                                p.points += 1;
                                p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.points +"", 601, 7); //Bandos.
                        }
                        if (npcType == 6222) // Kree'ara
                        {
                                p.apoints += 1;
                                p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.apoints +"", 601, 7); //Armadyl.
                        }
                        if (npcType == 6247) // Comander Zilyana
                        {
                                p.spoints += 1;
                                p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.spoints +"", 601, 7); //Saradomin.
                        }
                        if (npcType == 6222)// Krill'Tstaruth
                        {
                                p.zpoints += 1;
                                p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.zpoints +"", 601, 7); //Zamorak.
                        }

It should be under the dead method.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Godwars Killcount help. [508]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hiya,
I am adding Godwars with Working killcount to my server. I have added this code into NPC.java

[code=java] //–Start of godwars npc–//

		if (npcType == 6260) //general graardor
		{
			p.points += 1;
			p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.points +"", 601, 7); //Bandos.
		}
		if (npcType == 6222) // Kree'ara
		{
			p.apoints += 1;
			p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.apoints +"", 601, 7); //Armadyl.
		}
		if (npcType == 6247) // Comander Zilyana
		{
			p.spoints += 1;
			p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.spoints +"", 601, 7); //Saradomin.
		}
		if (npcType == 6222)// Krill'Tstaruth
		{
			p.zpoints += 1;
			p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.zpoints +"", 601, 7); //Zamorak.
		}[/code]

I have also added these ints into my player.java

public int points = 0; //bandos public int apoints = 0; //armadyl public int spoints = 0; //saradomin public int zpoints = 0; //zamorak

However, when i kill a NPC that is suppoed to give KillCount it doesnt add the points to my Character file and doesnt even create the field where the killcount is supposed to be added for example “apoints”

Please could somebody help, because this is driving me mad.

Read full topic
